basics.name: Evgenii Kolodin
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: Graduate engineer with a partial PhD and master-equivalent degree looking for a developer position. With a background as a scientist, was extensively using his programming skills in C++ and Python to solve problems of radiation safety and conduct ionising radiation transport modelling with the Monte-Carlo method and GEANT4 framework support. Also, have several pet projects related to web and desktop development. Familiar with technologies such as FastAPI and Flask, Qt5 and tkinter libraries. Passed development courses in C++, python, perl and go in 2016-2017. Looking for an opportunity to grow as a developer to improve my competencies and participate in interesting projects.
